channel.title: Fastest/Cheapest to 99 Herb?
channel.description: 99 Herb has been a dream of mine, because well it's one of those capes that are mega expensive, and people look at you different with it. But I'm poor as heck on rs, what's either the fastest way, or the cheapest way. I'm currently 70 Herb.

item.title: Fastest/Cheapest to 99 Herb?
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

its very hard to clean herbs for profit, the ge is so fucked up u gotta buy everything +5 or +10 unless u wanna wait ages for it to buy then when your selling u gotta sell it for -5 or wait overnight

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest/Cheapest to 99 Herb?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:5, topic:510112”]Oh, I doubt it would be profitable anymore. I got to 70 on an account pretty quickly back in the day when it was, though.
It should still be ‘cheaper’ though when compared to actual potion making.[/quote]

Most herbs are profitable, use the spreadsheets! It is definitely not fast xp though.

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest/Cheapest to 99 Herb?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

docs.google.com

Grimy's Herblore

Herblore Scroll of Cleansing Income Material 1, Price,#, Material 2, Price,#, Product, Price,#, Tick, Inv, Bank, xp, Items/ hour, gp/ hour, xp/ hour, gp/ xp, 5m Cleaning Herbs, More than 1 action per tick. Mousekeys recommended to do 2 per tick ...

Super attacks still look to be the cheapest xp, and the upside is you get to turn those into extreme attacks at the appropriate level!

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest/Cheapest to 99 Herb?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Lothy:

Is herb cleaning still a thing? The only downside is that you need millions in capital, otherwise you can’t buy enough grimy herbs at a time.

I haven’t seen any profitable herb cleaning, and since I can buy huge quantities, my cash would dwindle before I could hit 99.

Read full topic
